0eb1c1b7-8e36-4a13-abd4-0b6bb1f7bdb9.name: Quit All Applications

b7d20d83-ca3d-4c5d-8705-1b567fa8dcee.name: Work Tools
b7d20d83-ca3d-4c5d-8705-1b567fa8dcee.cmd:
#!/usr/bin/env bash

# Check if Brave is already running
if ! pgrep "brave" >/dev/null; then
	echo "Launching Brave..."
	brave &
else
	echo "Brave is already running."
fi

sleep 2

# Check if Alacritty is already running
if ! pgrep -x "alacritty" >/dev/null; then
	echo "Launching Alacritty..."
	alacritty &
else
	echo "Alacritty is already running."
fi

# Check if Telegram is already running
if ! pgrep -x "telegram-desktop" >/dev/null; then
	echo "Launching Telegram..."
	telegram-desktop
else
	echo "Telegram is already running."
fi
